sections.text:
81-1020.Permanent assignment of bureau fleet vehicle; approval required.

Any agency which has a permanently assigned bureau fleet vehicle shall, prior to assigning such vehicle to an employee on a twenty-four-hour basis, obtain written approval from the chief of the transportation services bureau.

SourceLaws 1981, LB 381, ยง 18;Laws 2012, LB779, ยง 10.
